description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use your button-smashing "clickit" skills to dig in the mine for stones and minerals. Level up, add workers, collect money to become billionaire and try to complete the inventory by finding rare, undiscovered gems!
description.short: Use your button-smashing "clickit" skills to dig in the mine for stones and minerals. Level up, add workers, collect money to become billionaire and try to complete the inventory by finding rare, undiscovered gems!
